sub_title: Technical Team Lead for Risk Modeling Applications in Finance
summary:
Jozef has spent the past decade designing, developing, deploying and maintaning risk modeling applications in production for international insurance businesses and has actuarial experience in both life and non-life insurance. He has a combination of 2 main skill sets:

- Software development - mainly in R, Python, Scala (Apache Spark-focused) and related CI/CD solutions (Jenkins, Bamboo), containerized solutions using Docker and database systems (Oracle, MS SQL Server) 
- Data science and actuarial science - Having a strong background in probability, mathematical statistics and holding actuarial certification

Scope: 
To use data mining and statistical models to detect and minimize the fraud on value added tax in the Slovak Republic, with main focus on carousel fraud. My responsibility was to analyze and to model the financial data of companies (VAT payers) using various software programs (R, MS Excel VBA), to provide best solutions based on these results, get approval and implement them into data mining models created in SPSS Clementine.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Jozef', 'last_name': 'H.', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Technical Team Lead for Risk Modeling Applications in Finance'}]}, {'title': 'Actuarial reporting and KPI development', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': 'Augustus Consulting - Contracted project

Scope:
Create and implement KPIs and reports in various BI tools to present overall actuarial and other types of insurance company data to the top management. Initially MS Excel was used, including VBA, to get a good overview and analyze the data (the insurance companyâ€™s finances, life and non-life portfolio, claims, reserves, etc.). Second part of the project consisted in designing BI dashboards in various modern BI tools such as SAS Visual Analytics and QlickView in order to offer a 360 degree look on companyâ€™s data.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Jozef', 'last_name': 'H.', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Technical Team Lead for Risk Modeling Applications in Finance'}]}]
